- Location: Under kitchen sink; drain/trap assembly visible.  
- Materials: White PVC P-trap and trap arm; gray metal 90Â° elbow into trap inlet; braided stainless steel water supply lines.  
- Condition: No active leaks seen; slip-nut joints appear secure.  
- Concern: Nonstandard metal-to-PVC transition (gray elbow into trap) may be prone to leakage; consider all-PVC or proper transition.  
- Wall area: Exposed wall with spray foam; ensure proper sealing to prevent moisture/pest ingress.
